subject: Steroids
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The sentencing date for Kirk Radomski — the former Mets clubhouse attendant who earlier this year pleaded guilty to distributing steroids — has been pushed back for a third time.
snippet: The sentencing date for Kirk Radomski — the former Mets clubhouse attendant who earlier this year pleaded guilty to distributing steroids — has been pushed back for a third time.
